# Custom markdown tags

### Labels

||This is a label!||
||This is a label!|warning||
||This is a label!|success||

## Spoiler

> and captcha protected spoilers:

\{{Simple spoiler|info}}

!\{{Write me at <john.doe@example.com>|info}}

## Progress bars

=====0%=====
=====10%|error=====
=====40%|warning=====
=====80%|success=====

## Glyphicons

::|search::

## Badges

[[42]]
[[42|danger]]

## Jumbotrons

////
Hello, world|small
////

## Alerts

!!New update released! !!
!!New update released!|info!!
